name: Two Sided War
description:
It's a short strategy game. 

It's a war and only few soldier are left from both sides.

 Your goal is to eliminate all the enemies but keep an eye on your soldiers health. 

If you make any mistake you can reset the time and all your soldiers will come to life but it will affect enemies to and they will become alive too.

We always have two views

We want our soldiers to win

But enemies to lose.
